Did you update the launch files as posted to eclipse.org?:

"Launch files that are created by the debugger also need to be changed.

If you have taken a new workbench this will not be an issue.

To fix an old workspace, edit all of the .launch files, replacing
"org.eclipse.pde.*" with "org.eclipse.pde.ui.*."

Launch files can found in two places:
1. The .metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.debug.core/.launches directory
2. In your projects (shared launches)."

The error message could be improved.

Of course not <g>.
I get no errors when I do.
